entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
